title: Emily Brontë and the Punky Pixie
description: Tomorrow it’s the school Christmas prom. Cath has a date with Megan and knows it should be the best night of her life. Except, all she has to wear is a stupid pink thing her granny chose. As if that weren’t bad enough, the ghost of Emily Brontë insists on giving her advice. Nobody knows better than she how problematic families can be. But who wants fashion hints off someone who died over three hundred years ago?Fortunately, there’s magic in the wind from the moors and when Cath opens the windows—look out!
author: Eule Grey
